TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: Don't just take our word for it, hear from cricket fans who love our app
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app is a game-changer for cricket enthusiasts! Real-time scores, detailed stats, and an intuitive interface make following matches a breeze.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a coach, I rely on this app to analyze player performances and strategize for upcoming matches. The in-depth data is invaluable.
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Whether I'm at the stadium or on the go, this app ensures I never miss a single over. The notifications keep me updated with all the action.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common questions about our cricket scoring app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What is the Cricket Score app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: The Cricket Score app is a user-friendly mobile application that allows you to easily track and record scores during cricket matches. It provides a convenient way to keep score in real-time, eliminating the need for pen and paper.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How do I use the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Using the app is simple. Just start a new match, enter the team details, and tap the scoring buttons to record runs, wickets, extras, and other events as the match progresses. The app automatically calculates and displays the updated scores.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I save and resume matches?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes, the Cricket Score app allows you to save matches in progress and resume them later. This feature is handy if a match gets interrupted or if you need to take a break.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Absolutely! The app keeps a history of all completed matches, allowing you to review scorecards, statistics, and other details from past games whenever you need them.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Is the app available for both iOS and Android?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, the Cricket Score app is available for both iOS and Android devices. Simply download it from the respective app store (Apple App Store or Google Play Store) and start using it right away.

CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get in Touch for Live Cricket Scores
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Let's discuss how we can keep you updated with the latest cricket action
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions about Cricket Scores
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the app track live cricket scores?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app uses official data feeds from cricket boards and major tournaments to provide real-time scoring updates for matches around the world.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Can I follow my favorite teams and players?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes, you can create a personalized feed to follow specific teams, players, tournaments, and get notifications for key events and milestones.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: What kind of statistics are available?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: The app offers detailed stats like batting averages, strike rates, economy rates, and head-to-head records for teams and individual players.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is historical data available for past matches?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Absolutely, you can access scores and statistics from previous cricket matches and tournaments going back several years.
PAGE_DETAIL_1_VALUE: Get ball-by-ball updates and live scorecard for all international and domestic cricket matches.
PAGE_DETAIL_2_VALUE: Gain insights into team and player performances with detailed statistics and match highlights.
PAGE_DETAIL_3_VALUE: Follow your favorite teams, get notification alerts, and customize your app experience.
